actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Amendments of 1972 to extend for an additional year the program of 100 percent reimbursement of States for sums expended for inspection of institutions providing long-term care to recipients of medical assistance.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to extend, until September 30, 1981, the 100 percent Federal reimbursement level for the cost of compensating or training personnel to conduct health and safety inspections of institutions providing long-term care to Medicaid recipients.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Amendments of 1972 to extend for an additional year the program of 100 percent reimbursement of States for sums expended for inspection of institutions providing long-term care to recipients of medical assistance.
